text: Kamaghɨn Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ nɨ damightɨ nɨ kantrin avɨribar afeziamɨn otogham.” Akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam, God uabɨ a gamizɨ an an damazimɨn gavgafi. Godɨn kamra, Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti. Egha Godɨn kam, a gumazir ovengezibagh amima me ua dɨkafi, egha a pura mɨgeima bizir faragha itir puvatɨziba, da otifi.(4:17) Grighɨn akam, vezɨn kam deragha bigha mɨkemezir puvatɨ. Marazi nɨghnɨgha ghaze, vezɨn kam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Abraham, Godɨn damazimɨn en ovavir afeziam.”
